data.Name: The Warning
data.Bio: The Warning is a rock band from Monterrey, Mexico, started in 2013 by three sisters. Daniela (guitar, lead vocals), Paulina (drums, vocals, piano), and Alejandra Villarreal (bass guitar, piano, backing vocals) are well known for their 2014 cover of Metallica's "Enter Sandman" on their YouTube chanelgarnering attention from the likes of Muse and Coldplay, besides led them to a guest appearance on The Ellen DeGeneres Show on April 24, 2015.
